CFPB Announcement Regarding Enforcement Actions Related to Buy Now,= Pay Later Loans

The CFPB is announcing that it will not prioritize enforcement = actions taken on the basis of the Truth in Lending (Regulation Z); Use of D= igital User Accounts to Access Buy Now, Pay Later Loans, 89 Fed. Reg. 47,06= 8 (May 31, 2024) (=E2=80=9CBuy Now, Pay Later=E2=80=9D).
